reviewText: Eye-opening for me. Very informative, in ways I expected and ways I did not. "Road To Fallujah" tells the story from both sides of the conflict in Iraq ( The November 2004 battle) and offers non-violent solutions to war.

Offers an eye-witness account at the war on terror from the eyes of those living in Fallujah. Despite all the obvious violence and terror, this film promotes acts of non-violence and peace for the future. In a time where a lot of people shield themselves from unpleasant  worldly news, this film tells an informative tale of what has happened but also gives hope. Highly recommended!
